node.title: ThreeFold at Consensus: A Decentralized World is in Our Hands
node.excerpt: Itâ€™s that time of the year when believers and builders of a decentralized tomorrow gather to celebrate the festival for the decentralized world. And ThreeFold is the foundation to realize a truly decentralized world.
